Text: I just remembered that most people do not want you to convert to mp3 and share the bootlegs.  If you take any offense or have a problem with this torrent let me know and I will remove it.  It took me a really long time to write that damn info file so I'll leave it up.
You got Burn Like A Candle (June 25 1972) anywhere?

Long time ago I lost my password for zeppelinmad4 and wasnt able to recover it so I had to create a new username and forgot all about this torrent.
@Imperator42: I'm sure I do. I'll do some digging around.

cool; thanks for the eventual reply.
The only version of Burn Like a Candle I found elsewhere was merely a partial version of that show; I'll also look around.
What a great collection. I've been looking for the Earl's Court recording for a long time and I finally found it. Thank You!
